# Issue #29: Create skill-professor skill

## Description

Use the skill-creator skill to create the skill-professor skill.
This new skill will take a specified skill and create a tutorial to teach the user the skill
After the completing the tutorial the user should be able to fully understand and perform the skill
The tutorial should help the user learn and apply the skill to their own project so that upon completion they will have implemented a solution that they can build upon moving forward
